name: Pan with lid
description:
The pan will be utilize as part of our community initiative, Masak-Masak, run by the residents themselves. Every Thursday, residents will gather at our community hub to prepare the ingredients, cook and have lunch together. The program encourages friendship and solidarity among residents, young and old. Children and youth would drop by to have a meal together too. 

As the initiative is reaching out to more residents, they need an additional pan to accommodate the team expanding. The current pan they have is nearing to its wear-tear age and get burns easily. Hence, they need a halal and stove-induction friendly pan with lid to continue their passion of cooking and generosity of looking out for one another through food.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Nur Hazirah Bte Salehudin

name: Halal Food Rations/Groceries

Client's husband, who was family's sole breadwinner, is self-employed and is earning inconsistently. Due to multiple arrears and rejection from SSO assistance, client is experiencing distress in managing the family finance. Family is therefore seeking for food rations to help reduce family's expenses this month. For further liaison, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

Thank you!

name: Halal rice cooker
description:
643 community hub is a space in the Yio Chu Kang neighbourhood where residents connect and build relationships with one another.

As the hub invites more and more residents to join us in our programs and initiatives, the hub is also starting to grow out of its rice cooker. The rice cooker we are currently holding on to is too small to support the number of residents that the hub is inviting. 

The community here at 643 community hub hopes that as the friends and community here at Yio Chu Kang grow, there will be a donor out there who is willing to give their rice cooker a second chance and donate it to 643 community hub.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
